title: Block media-gateway
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND the media-gateway endpoint is blocked (to simulate a failure)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a feed to play
custom_expected:
THEN the feed will not play
AND an error message will display
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14367851)

title: Block media source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND the media source (ie tv-fast.mlb.com/* AND/OR tv-gmc.mlb.com/*) is blocked (to simulate a failure)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a playable feed
custom_expected:
THEN the feed will not play
AND an error message will display indicating a timeout
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14367852)

title: No feeds Error message
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game before the media has started
custom_expected:
THEN an error message will be displayed indicating there are no feeds available
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14367853)

title: Block initSession
custom_preconds: GIVEN a MGW session is not successfully created on app startup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts gam playback
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app should call initSession before calling initPlaybackSession
AND content plays successfully

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an initPlaybackSession call returns  a session expired error
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app call initSession to refresh the MGW session
AND re-attempt playback for the same MGW content
AND content plays successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a valid MGW session already exists
AND initPlaybackSession does not return a session expired error
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN initSession should not be called
AND content plays successfully
